channel.title: Remove From Group Feature
channel.description: As a streamer, it would be nice to have a "remove from group" function built into private lobbies. Unfortunately people banned from twitch chat can still read it and see the invite code, allowing them to join freely. (disclaimer : obviously they can still snipe public queues, we have no control over that)

item.title: Remove From Group Feature
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
misread it as streamsniping because I’m dumb

Anyway, best fix is a mute.

But yeah, it is needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove From Group Feature
item.dc:creator: Thrustmaster
item.description:
As a streamer, it would be nice to have a “remove from group” function built into private lobbies. Unfortunately people banned from twitch chat can still read it and see the invite code, allowing them to join freely. (disclaimer : obviously they can still snipe public queues, we have no control over that)

Read full topic
